text: Siurgus Donigala (Seùrgus Donigàla, Sriùgus Donigàlla) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,992 people lived there. Its area is 76.39 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 452 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Siurgus Donigala
